speaker: Carla
Text: Carla: Come on...they always take so long to make my Passion tea..

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: Oh! Looks like there's breaking news on the tv.
....a 16 year old male, identified as DeAndre Parker, was shot and killed this afternoon by an officer at the local 24-7 Mart.
Witnesses say that the teenager was accompanied by three other teenage males and were all acting aggressive towards the police officer.
Officer David White was initially called to the scene by the store owner, who believed that the group had intended to rob the store.
Officer White says that he feared for his life after being outnumbered by the four aggressors.
He also claims that they were acting violently and that he belived they could have been armed and dangerous.
Upon further investigation, there was no weapon found on Parker's body.

speaker: Emma
Text: Emma: Looks like our drinks are ready though.

speaker: Isabel
Text: Isabel: Ok now lets get out of here.
